edge: The movie 'A Thousand Words' was filmed in August 2008 in Los Angeles, California
The movie 'A Thousand Words' was initially scheduled for a January 2012 release, but was later released on February 2012 due to unspecified reasons
The release date of 'A Thousand Words' was repeatedly delayed and was finally released on March 9, 2012. However, it was initially scheduled for a release on April 20, 2012
